dt-option.name: language.searchPanes.clearMessage
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the Clear button

type.description:
Setting the `-init languages.searchPanes.clearMessage` option to a string of your choice allows the Clear All button to have custom text within it.
This property is passed through an `-api i18n()` function.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init languages.searchPanes.clearMessage` parameter is `"Clear All"`.
dt-option.description: As standard, SearchPanes will set the message to be displayed in the Clear button to 'Clear All'. This property allows that message to be configured.

example.title: Change message for the Clear button
